DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate influence superstructure material crestal bone resorption esthetic outcome dental implant patient single miss tooth aesthetic zone .
DOC.brief_title: Influence Superstructure Material Crestal Bone Resorption Esthetic Outcome Dental Implants
DOC.detailed_description: The transfer occlusal force implant bone interface greatly influence long term prognosis implant crestal bone resorption . Accordingly study investigate influence metal ceramic crown monolithic zirconia crown crestal bone resorption loading . Also crown material greatly influence final aesthetic outcome definitive restoration , evaluate use pink white aesthetic score system .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients 18 year old . 2 . Patients able read sign inform consent document . 3 . Medically free patient control systemic disease . 4 . Patients good bone quality quantity evaluate use C.B.C.T . 5 . Patients willing return followup examination evaluation . 6 . Patients single miss recently extract premolar tooth . 1 . Young patient growth stage . 2 . Patients unsuitable implantation site ( patient major boney defect sever bone resorption ) 3 . Pregnant woman avoid complication may occur dental office . 4 . Patients uncontrolled systemic disease ( hypertensive patient uncontrolled diabetic patient ) 5 . Psychiatric problem unrealistic expectation . 6 . Multiple adjacent miss teeth . 7 . Patients bad oral hygiene
